name: IKSlideshowDataSource
desc: The IKSlideshowDataSource protocol describes the methods that an IKSlideshow object uses to access the contents of its data source object.

items.name: func numberOfSlideshowItems() -> Int
items.desc: Returns the number of items in a slideshow.

items.name: func slideshowItem(at: Int) -> Any!
items.desc: Returns the item for a given index

items.name: func nameOfSlideshowItem(at: Int) -> String!
items.desc: Returns the display name for item at the specified index.

items.name: func canExportSlideshowItem(at: Int, toApplication: String!) -> Bool
items.desc: Reports whether the export button should be enabled for a slideshow item.

items.name: func slideshowWillStart()
items.desc: Performs custom tasks when the slideshow is about to start.

items.name: func slideshowDidStop()
items.desc: Performs custom tasks when the slideshow stops.

items.name: func slideshowDidChangeCurrentIndex(Int)
items.desc: Performs custom tasks when the slideshow changes to the item at the specified index.
